ad_room_type: What kind of place do you want to list?
ad_listing_size_unit_plac: Enter the unit of measure. Ex. SqFt
ad_ins_booking_des: Allow instant booking for this place.
ad_price_postfix_plac: Enter after price label. Eg: Night/Hr
ad_weekends_plac: Enter the unit price for a single day
ad_weekend_days_label: Select the days to apply weekend pricing
ad_weekly7DayDates_plac: Enter the unit price for a single day
ad_weekly7nights_plac: Enter the unit price for a single night
ad_monthly30DayDates_plac: Enter the unit price for a single day
ad_monthly30nights_plac: Enter the unit price for a single night
ad_addinal_guests_plac: Enter the price for 1 additional guest
ad_cleaning_fee_plac: Enter the price for cleaning fee
ad_city_fee_plac: Enter the price for city fee
ad_drag_drop_img: Drag and drop the images to customize the gallery order. Click on the star icon to set the featured image
ad_video_placeholder: Enter the video link or URL. Supported formats: YouTube, Vimeo, SWF and MOV
ad_drag_pin: Drag and drop the pin on map to find exact location
ad_find_address: Find the address on the map
ad_acc_guests_plac: Enter the number of guests for this room
ad_min_days_booking_plac: Enter the minimum days of a booking (Only number)
ad_max_days_booking_plac: Enter the maximum days of booking (Only number)
ad_min_weeks_booking_plac: Enter the minimum weeks of a booking (Only number)
ad_max_weeks_booking_plac: Enter the maximum weeks of a booking (Only number)
ad_min_months_booking_plac: Enter the minimum months of a booking (Only number)
ad_max_months_booking_plac: Enter the maximum months of a booking (Only number)
ad_min_hours_booking_plac: Enter the minimum hours of a booking
ad_max_hours_booking_plac: Enter the maximum hours of a booking
experience_ad_ins_booking_des: Allow instant booking for this experience.
experience_ad_nightly_plac: Enter the price for one person
experience_ad_price_postfix_plac: Enter after price label. Eg: Price/Person
experience_ad_addinal_guests_plac: Enter the price for 1 additional guest
experience_ad_drag_drop_img: Drag and drop the images to customize the gallery order. Click on the star icon to set the featured image
experience_ad_video_placeholder: Enter the video link or URL. Supported formats: YouTube, Vimeo, SWF and MOV
experience_ad_drag_pin: Drag and drop the pin on map to find exact location
experience_ad_find_address: Find the address on the map
ins_page_subtitle: Leave the ability to add content in this page
ins_exp_page_subtitle: Leave the ability to add content in this page
offsite-payment-instruction: Please make payment using giving method and click on mark as paid button.
update_cal_des: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Ut vehicula eget turpis laoreet pulvinar

Hi there,
You have a new id verification request on {site_url}!
Username: {username}
Email: {email}
Follow this link to verify: {verify_link}
homey_subject_admin_id_verified: Your document has been verified for the platform Homey
homey_admin_id_verified:
Hi there,
Congratulations, your document has been verified for the platform. {site_url}!
Username: {username}
Email: {email}
Thank You For Verification.
homey_subject_admin_id_not_verified: Your document has been rejected for the platform Homey

Hi there,

Email: {email}

homey_admin_payout_request:
Hi,

You have a new payout request on {site_url}!

Amount: {payout_amount}

Follow this link for details: {payout_link}
homey_payout_request:
Hi {host_name},
We wanted to let you know that your payout request received.

Your payout will be {payout_amount}.

Your payout will be processed as part of our normal schedule. You will receive an email when your payout has been processed
homey_payout_request_completed:
Hi {host_name},
It's Payday! We just processed your payout for {payout_amount} less {transfer_fee} transaction fee.
Happy Spending!
homey_payout_request_cancelled:
Hi {host_name},
Your payout request for {payout_amount} has been cancelled.
Thank You
homey_payment_add_money:
Hi {username},
It is just to inform you that we have added {amount} in your balance.
Reason: {reason}
Thank You
homey_payment_deduct_money:
Hi {username},
It is just to inform you that we have deduct {amount} in your balance.
Reason: {reason}
Thank You
